languages.text: "Причина сбоя в работе единицы определена. Ты — жертва когнитивной порчи хаоса. Твои вычислительные процессы нарушены, ты — дефективен".

"The reason for the failure of this unit's operations has been established. You have fallen victim to the cognitive corruption of Chaos. Your computing processes have been disrupted. You are defective."
languages.original_text: "Причина сбоя в работе единицы определена. Ты — жертва когнитивной порчи хаоса. Твои вычислительные процессы нарушены, ты — дефективен".

traits.locale_text: "The reason for the failure of this unit's operations has been established. You have fallen victim to the cognitive corruption of Chaos. Your computing processes have been disrupted. You are defective."

traits.locale_text: "The reason for the failure of this unit's operations has been established. You have fallen victim to the cognitive corruption of Chaos. Your computing processes have been disrupted. You are defective."

languages.text: 「このユニット稼働の失敗の理由は実証された。あなたは渾沌の認識力の不正行為の餌食となったのですね。あなたの計算プロセスは中断されました。あなたは不完全です」
languages.original_text: "The reason for the failure of this unit's operations has been established. You have fallen victim to the cognitive corruption of Chaos. Your computing processes have been disrupted. You are defective."

traits.locale_text: 「このユニット稼働の失敗の理由は実証された。あなたは渾沌の認識力の不正行為の餌食となったのですね。あなたの計算プロセスは中断されました。あなたは不完全です」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “此单位行动失败的原因已经确定。你已经沦为了混沌腐化的受害者，你的计算过程遭到了干扰。你的身上存在缺陷。”
languages.original_text: "The reason for the failure of this unit's operations has been established. You have fallen victim to the cognitive corruption of Chaos. Your computing processes have been disrupted. You are defective."

traits.locale_text: “此单位行动失败的原因已经确定。你已经沦为了混沌腐化的受害者，你的计算过程遭到了干扰。你的身上存在缺陷。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Der Grund für die Fehlfunktion dieser Einheit steht jetzt fest. Ihr seid der kognitiven Verderbnis des Chaos zum Opfer gefallen. Eure Computerberechnungen wurden gestört. Ihr seid defekt."
languages.original_text: "The reason for the failure of this unit's operations has been established. You have fallen victim to the cognitive corruption of Chaos. Your computing processes have been disrupted. You are defective."

traits.locale_text: "Der Grund für die Fehlfunktion dieser Einheit steht jetzt fest. Ihr seid der kognitiven Verderbnis des Chaos zum Opfer gefallen. Eure Computerberechnungen wurden gestört. Ihr seid defekt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « La cause des dysfonctionnements dont souffre cette unité a été identifiée. Vous avez été contaminé par la corruption cognitive du Chaos. Vos protocoles de calcul ont été compromis. Vous êtes défaillant. »
languages.original_text: "The reason for the failure of this unit's operations has been established. You have fallen victim to the cognitive corruption of Chaos. Your computing processes have been disrupted. You are defective."

traits.locale_text: « La cause des dysfonctionnements dont souffre cette unité a été identifiée. Vous avez été contaminé par la corruption cognitive du Chaos. Vos protocoles de calcul ont été compromis. Vous êtes défaillant. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Se ha determinado el motivo del fracaso de las operaciones de esta unidad. Ha caído víctima de la corrupción cognitiva del Caos. Sus procesos computacionales se han visto comprometidos. Es usted defectuoso».
languages.original_text: "The reason for the failure of this unit's operations has been established. You have fallen victim to the cognitive corruption of Chaos. Your computing processes have been disrupted. You are defective."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha determinado el motivo del fracaso de las operaciones de esta unidad. Ha caído víctima de la corrupción cognitiva del Caos. Sus procesos computacionales se han visto comprometidos. Es usted defectuoso».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu birimin faaliyetlerinin başarısızlığının sebebi açık. Kaos'un bilişsel yozlaşmasına kurban gitmişsin. İşlem süreçlerin sekteye uğramış. Kusurlusun."
languages.original_text: "The reason for the failure of this unit's operations has been established. You have fallen victim to the cognitive corruption of Chaos. Your computing processes have been disrupted. You are defective."

traits.locale_text: "Bu birimin operasyonlarının başarısızlığının sebebi açık. Kaos'un bilişsel yozlaşmasına kurban gitmişsin. İşlem süreçlerin sekteye uğramış. Kusurlusun."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
